q: musicians including Billy Joel and the Police. Don Kirshner also helped launch the careers of Prince, The Eagles, Lionel Richie and Ozzy Osborne. The show also boosted careers of comics including Billy Crystal , Arsenio Hall and David Letterman . Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business, Billy Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists.''
